name: ListProjectMembers
description:
Retrieve all members of a specified project on Vercel.

Use this tool to get a list of all team members associated with a particular project in Vercel. Call it when you need to know who is involved in a given project.

parameters.name: project_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the project to list members for.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the Project.

parameters.name: member_limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of project members to return. Provide an integer value.

value_schema.description: Limit how many project members should be returned

parameters.name: added_since_timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp in milliseconds to include members added since this time.

value_schema.description: Timestamp in milliseconds to only include members added since then.

parameters.name: end_time_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp in milliseconds to include project members added until this time.

value_schema.description: Timestamp in milliseconds to only include members added until then.

parameters.name: search_project_members
parameters.description: Search for project members by name, username, or email.

value_schema.description: Search project members by their name, username, and email.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team to perform the request on behalf of. This should be a string.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of, identifying the specific team associated with the project.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many project members should be returned

value_schema.description: Limit how many project members should be returned

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Timestamp in milliseconds to only include members added since then.

value_schema.description: Timestamp in milliseconds to only include members added since then.

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Timestamp in milliseconds to only include members added until then.

value_schema.description: Timestamp in milliseconds to only include members added until then.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search project members by their name, username, and email.

value_schema.description: Search project members by their name, username, and email.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrName
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Project.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the Project.
